record.field: Machine Learning Approach for Smart City Development
A Comprehensive Study on IoT Integration
Dr. Ahmad Sutanto, Prof. Sri Wahyuni, M.Eng
International Conference on Information and Communication Technology
machine learning, smart city, IoT, artificial intelligence
Penelitian ini mengeksplorasi penerapan machine learning dalam pengembangan smart city melalui integrasi teknologi IoT.

Abstract: This paper presents a comprehensive study on the application of machine learning techniques in smart city development through IoT integration. The research focuses on developing efficient algorithms for urban data processing and decision-making systems.
Sustainable Engineering Solutions for Climate Change Mitigation
Prof. Budi Hartono, Dr. Siti Nurhaliza, Ir. Made Wirawan
International Conference on Sustainable Engineering and Environmental Technology
sustainability, climate change, green technology, environmental engineering
Makalah ini membahas solusi rekayasa berkelanjutan untuk mitigasi perubahan iklim melalui teknologi hijau.

Abstract: This study investigates sustainable engineering approaches to address climate change challenges. The research proposes innovative green technologies and methodologies for environmental protection and sustainable development.
Innovative Mathematics Teaching Methods in Digital Era
Dr. Rina Sari, M.Pd. Joko Santoso, S.Pd. Dewi Lestari
mathematics education, digital learning, teaching methods, technology integration
Penelitian ini mengeksplorasi metode pengajaran matematika inovatif di era digital untuk meningkatkan pemahaman siswa.

Abstract: This research explores innovative mathematics teaching methods in the digital era. The study examines the effectiveness of technology-integrated approaches in enhancing student understanding and engagement in mathematics learning.
